sentences.en: Discover the delights and luxury of a private yacht.
sentences.cn: 体验私人游艇的乐趣和奢华。

sentences.en: Forest Service crews often discover campfires that have not been put out completely.
sentences.cn: 林务局工作人员常常发现未完全熄灭的营火。

sentences.en: Haskell did not live to discover the deception.
sentences.cn: 哈斯克尔至死都没识破那个骗局。

sentences.en: He was pleasantly surprised to discover that he was no longer afraid.
sentences.cn: 让他惊喜的是他发现自己不再害怕了.

sentences.en: He was stunned to discover cost overruns of at least $1 billion.
sentences.cn: 他震惊地发现花费至少超了10亿美元。

sentences.en: It is upsetting to discover that you have backed a loser.
sentences.cn: 发现自己的投注对象输了是一件让人心烦的事。

sentences.en: It was a shock to discover the truth about his sordid past.
sentences.cn: 他以往的丑行被发现时，人们感到震惊。

sentences.en: It was difficult for the inspectors to discover which documents were important.
sentences.cn: 检查员们很难发现哪些文件是重要的。

sentences.en: Scientists are now trying to discover if this is possible.
sentences.cn: 科学家现在正在努力去探索这是否有可能.

sentences.en: She discovered that she was pregnant.
The body was discovered in a field.
sentences.cn: 尸体是在一块田地里找到的。

sentences.en: The newly discover-ed notes are nothing more than Lang's personal journal.
sentences.cn: 新发现的笔记只不过是朗的个人日志。

sentences.en: The rumor is false, so far as I can discover.
sentences.cn: 就我所看到的实情来说,那谣言是不真实的.

sentences.en: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
sentences.cn: 当你从内心深处找到一种可以忍受一切痛苦的坚强力量时，你的成长历程就会出现飞跃。

sentences.en: They discover that the new teacher is a martinet.
sentences.cn: 他们发现新来的老师非常严格.

sentences.en: They were thrilled to discover a perfectly preserved specimen of Roman pottery.
sentences.cn: 他们因发现了一件保存完好的罗马时代陶器而欣喜若狂.

sentences.en: We may begin to discover overlaps.
sentences.cn: 我们可能开始发现交叉的部分了。

sentences.en: We tried vainly to discover what had happened.
sentences.cn: 我们设法想要弄清楚发生了什么事,但却徒劳.

words.tran_cn: 发现，发觉；被发现的事物

trans.tran_cn: 发现，找到，了解到，发掘(人才)
trans.tran_en: to find someone or something, either by accident or because you were looking for them

trans.tran_cn: 发现， 找到， 发觉
trans.tran_en: to find someone or something, either by accident or because you were looking for them
